title: bhakti minshAram
sahitya:
bhakti minshAram aruLvAi paramAtmanE bhakti minshAram aruLvAi


anupallavi

  shaktiyai AdhAra cakkarattil eTri sahasrAra siddhiyAl sacitAnandam perum


caraNam 1    citta shuddhiyuDanE dhyAnattir-kUTTi tIyezhum Atma vivEkattai nATTi
eddishaiyilum unnai ezhil pera kATTi eppOdum ennuLLun inbattai UTTIppara
    caraNam 2    mukguNa vinaiyiruL muTrilum vilagiDa mUla kuNDalik-kanal mUNDennuL ilakiDap-
pakkuvak-kani pOl en pAmalar pazhuttiDap-pArelAm cinmayam pArtuLan-shilirttidA
